name: tenoxui
description: A CSS Framework without CSS file :D

scripts.build-js: terser src/js/tenoxui.js -o dist/js/tenoxui.min.js --mangle --source-map url='tenoxui.min.js.map' && cp src/js/tenoxui.js src/js/tenoxui.d.ts src/js/tenoxui.js.map dist/js/
scripts.build-esm: terser src/js/tenoxui.esm.js -o dist/js/tenoxui.esm.min.js --mangle --source-map url='tenoxui.esm.min.js.map' && cp src/js/tenoxui.esm.js src/js/tenoxui.esm.d.ts src/js/tenoxui.esm.js.map dist/js/
scripts.build-prop: terser src/js/lib/property.js -o dist/js/lib/property.js --mangle --source-map url='property.js.map' && cp src/js/lib/property.d.ts dist/js/lib/
scripts.build-css: cleancss src/css/tenoxui.css -o dist/css/tenoxui.min.css --source-map && cp src/css/tenoxui.css dist/css/
scripts.build-all: npm run build-js && npm run build-esm && npm run build-prop && prettier -w dist/js/tenoxui.js dist/js/tenoxui.esm.js

author: NOuSantx
